description:
Using the latest Nova 2012.2 trunk source I'm getting the following error when rebuilding instances w/ libvirt:

Cannot rebuild instance [f710f41e-f903-4f52-afbc-b689fae08584]: global name 'xml_info' is not defined
title: libvirt rebuild causes: global name 'xml_info' is not defined

comments.content:
Using the latest Nova 2012.2 trunk source I'm getting the following error when rebuilding instances w/ libvirt:

Cannot rebuild instance [f710f41e-f903-4f52-afbc-b689fae08584]: global name 'xml_info' is not defined

commit f34b904078c2b70ebf22fc9cfa0d87c7ef548381
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Mar 25 18:45:35 2012 -0400

    Fix libvirt global name 'xml_info' is not defined.
    
    Remove a line setting a stale xml_info variable.
    
    This caused failures when performing a rebuild w/ libvirt.
    
    Fixes LP Bug #964843.
    
    Change-Id: If8cbdb3198742d488325153c50d90a2ece67a3af
